card.name: Karn Liberated
card.property: +4: Target player exiles a card from their hand. −3: Exile target permanent. −14: Restart the game, leaving in exile all non-Aura permanent cards exiled with Karn Liberated. Then put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Apostle's Blessing
card.property: ({W/P} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.) Target artifact or creature you control gains protection from artifacts or from the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Auriok Survivors
card.property: When Auriok Survivors enters the battlefield, you may return target Equipment card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If you do, you may attach it to Auriok Survivors.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are Mirrodin's children. We will reclaim her—one scrap at a time, if we have to."

card.name: Blade Splicer
card.property: When Blade Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token. Golem creatures you control have first strike.

card.name: Cathedral Membrane
card.property: ({W/P} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.) Defender When Cathedral Membrane dies during combat, it deals 6 damage to each creature it blocked this combat.

card.name: Chancellor of the Annex
card.property: You may reveal this card from your opening hand. If you do, when each opponent casts their first spell of the game, counter that spell unless that player pays {1}. Flying Whenever an opponent casts a spell, counter it unless that player pays {1}.

card.name: Dispatch
card.property: Tap target creature. Metalcraft — If you control three or more artifacts, exile that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Venser wondered if it could still be called a teleportation spell if the destination is oblivion.

card.name: Due Respect
card.property: Permanents enter the battlefield tapped this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A display of humility is required of those who still possess such frailties." —Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

card.name: Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite
card.property: Vigilance Other creatures you control get +2/+2. Creatures your opponents control get -2/-2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Gitaxians whisper among themselves of other worlds. If they exist, we must bring Phyrexia's magnificence to them."

card.name: Exclusion Ritual
card.property: Imprint — When Exclusion Ritual enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent. Players can't cast spells with the same name as the exiled card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your desires have become our discretion." —Izathel, priest of the Annex

card.name: Forced Worship
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack. {2}{W}: Return Forced Worship to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Imprisonment teaches revenge. Hobbling teaches resignation.

card.name: Inquisitor Exarch
card.property: When Inquisitor Exarch enters the battlefield, choose one — • You gain 2 life. • Target opponent loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Skin is the prison of the blessed and the stronghold of the heretic." —Argent Etchings, plate 64, passage 17

card.name: Lost Leonin
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mirrans were broken down and rebuilt, made to be loyal servants of the force they had fought.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just one drop of the glistening oil can eventually stain even a soul as stalwart as a loxodon's beyond redemption.

card.name: Marrow Shards
card.property: ({W/P} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.) Marrow Shards deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are a single entity. Dissenters must be sutured into the Orthodoxy." —Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

card.name: Master Splicer
card.property: When Master Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token. Golems you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With Phyrexia's victory at hand, each sect began perfecting its vision.

card.name: Norn's Annex
card.property: ({W/P} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.) Creatures can't attack you or a planeswalker you control unless their controller pays {W/P} for each of those creatures.

card.name: Phyrexian Unlife
card.property: You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life. As long as you have 0 or less life, all damage is dealt to you as though its source had infect. (Damage is dealt to you in the form of poison counters.)

card.name: Porcelain Legionnaire
card.property: ({W/P} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.) First strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My new design has lightweight plating specially cultivated from heretics' spare tissues." —Izathel, priest of the Annex

card.name: Puresteel Paladin
card.property: Whenever an Equipment enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card. Metalcraft — Equipment you control have equip {0} as long as you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Remember the Fallen
card.property: Choose one or both — • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the Mirrans had fallen, Planeswalkers carried the burden of remembrance.

card.name: Sensor Splicer
card.property: When Sensor Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token. Golem creatures you control have vigilance.

card.name: Shattered Angel
card.property: Flying Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She preaches the blessings of the Machine Orthodoxy.

card.name: Shriek Raptor
card.property: Flying Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That's no glint hawk. The skies have changed for the worse." —Ria Ivor, White Sun partisan

card.name: Suture Priest
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain 1 life. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may have that player lose 1 life.

card.name: War Report
card.property: You gain life equal to the number of creatures on the battlefield plus the number of artifacts on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Underling Ethu's 263rd report read simply "Yes, my lord. Overwhelmingly, my lord." This marked the end of the Mirran-Phyrexian War.

card.name: Argent Mutation
card.property: Target permanent becomes an artifact in addition to its other types until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My world is corrupted beyond cleansing. I must prevent this from happening to others."—Karn

card.name: Arm with Aether
card.property: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, you may return target creature that player controls to its owner's hand."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Anything we can do to hurt the Phyrexian invaders is worth dying for."

card.name: Blighted Agent
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) Blighted Agent can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Urabrask may suspect our surveillance, but he cannot stop it." —Avaricta, Gitaxian sective

card.name: Chained Throatseeker
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) Chained Throatseeker can't attack unless defending player is poisoned.

card.name: Chancellor of the Spires
card.property: You may reveal this card from your opening hand. If you do, at the beginning of the first upkeep, each opponent puts the top seven cards of their library into their graveyard. Flying When Chancellor of the Spires enters the battlefield, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Corrupted Resolve
card.property: Counter target spell if its controller is poisoned.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Flesh is a sickness that infects Phyrexia." —Avaricta, Gitaxian sective

card.name: Deceiver Exarch
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Deceiver Exarch enters the battlefield, choose one — • Untap target permanent you control. • Tap target permanent an opponent controls.

card.name: Defensive Stance
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It isn't for fighting. It's for when the fighting's gone bad." —Kara Vrist, Mirran resistance

card.name: Gitaxian Probe
card.property: ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.) Look at target player's hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My flesh holds no secrets, monster. The spirit of Mirrodin will fight on." —Vy Covalt, Mirran resistance

card.name: Impaler Shrike
card.property: Flying Whenever Impaler Shrike deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. If you do, draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Interrogation is an unnecessary step for acquiring information." —Politus, Gitaxian morphologist

card.name: Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur
card.property: Flash At the beginning of your end step, draw seven cards. Each opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by seven.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is not a goal, but a process—the process of creating the perfect Phyrexia."

card.name: Mental Misstep
card.property: ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.) Counter target spell with converted mana cost 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your first mistake was thinking I would let you live long enough to make a second." —Sarnvax, Gitaxian sective

card.name: Mindculling
card.property: You draw two cards and target opponent discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why infiltrate their strongholds when what we seek resides in such a poorly guarded safe?" —Malcator, Executor of Synthesis

card.name: Numbing Dose
card.property: Enchant artifact or creature Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted permanent's controller, that player loses 1 life.

card.name: Phyrexian Ingester
card.property: Imprint — When Phyrexian Ingester enters the battlefield, you may exile target nontoken creature. Phyrexian Ingester gets +X/+Y, where X is the exiled creature card's power and Y is its toughness.

card.name: Phyrexian Metamorph
card.property: ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.) You may have Phyrexian Metamorph enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact or creature on the battlefield, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

card.name: Psychic Barrier
card.property: Counter target creature spell. Its controller loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I tolerate Phyrexians because the dragon requires it. But I have no patience for uninvited guests." —Tezzeret

card.name: Psychic Surgery
card.property: Whenever an opponent shuffles their library, you may look at the top two cards of that library. You may exile one of those cards. Then put the rest on top of that library in any order.

card.name: Spined Thopter
card.property: ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I appreciate the depravity of noble designs turned to devious ends." —Tezzeret

card.name: Spire Monitor
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each monitor is given an eye for each spire it is to guard.

card.name: Tezzeret's Gambit
card.property: ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.) Draw two cards, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Vapor Snag
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Its controller loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This creature is inadequate. Send it to the splicers for innovation." —Malcator, Executor of Synthesis

card.name: Viral Drake
card.property: Flying Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) {3}{U}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Wing Splicer
card.property: When Wing Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token. Golem creatures you control have flying.

card.name: Xenograft
card.property: As Xenograft enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Each creature you control is the chosen type in addition to its other types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I despise Vorinclex and his slobberings about 'evolution.' Only I know true progress." —Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur

card.name: Blind Zealot
card.property: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) Whenever Blind Zealot deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. If you do, destroy target creature that player controls.

card.name: Caress of Phyrexia
card.property: Target player draws three cards, loses 3 life, and gets three poison counters.

card.name: Chancellor of the Dross
card.property: You may reveal this card from your opening hand. If you do, at the beginning of the first upkeep, each opponent loses 3 life, then you gain life equal to the life lost this way. Flying, lifelink

card.name: Dementia Bat
card.property: Flying {4}{B}, Sacrifice Dementia Bat: Target player discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When terror outweighs all other thoughts, they will understand that I am the true Father of Machines." —Azax-Azog, the Demon Thane

card.name: Despise
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a creature or planeswalker card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Truth is always a weapon in your enemies' hands." —Geth, Lord of the Vault

card.name: Dismember
card.property: ({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.) Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You serve Phyrexia. Your pieces would better serve Phyrexia elsewhere." —Azax-Azog, the Demon Thane

card.name: Enslave
card.property: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, enchanted creature deals 1 damage to its owner.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Phyrexia extended its command until there was nothing left to take.

card.name: Entomber Exarch
card.property: When Entomber Exarch enters the battlefield, choose one — • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Evil Presence
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land is a Swamp.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Accorders would lament the transformation of their cherished lands, had they lived to see it." —Sheoldred, Whispering One

card.name: Geth's Verdict
card.property: Target player sacrifices a creature and loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everyone should owe you something." —Geth, Lord of the Vault

card.name: Glistening Oil
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has infect. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on enchanted creature. When Glistening Oil is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Glistening Oil to its owner's hand.

card.name: Grim Affliction
card.property: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the small wounds let hope bleed out.

card.name: Ichor Explosion
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first explosion that didn't excite goblins.

card.name: Life's Finale
card.property: Destroy all creatures, then search target opponent's library for up to three creature cards and put them into their graveyard. Then that player shuffles their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The feeble resistance of the flesh is over. Phyrexia spreads its shadow over all.

card.name: Mortis Dogs
card.property: Whenever Mortis Dogs attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn. When Mortis Dogs dies, target player loses life equal to its power.

card.name: Parasitic Implant
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, enchanted creature's controller sacrifices it and you create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.

card.name: Phyrexian Obliterator
card.property: Trample Whenever a source deals damage to Phyrexian Obliterator, that source's controller sacrifices that many permanents.

card.name: Pith Driller
card.property: ({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.) When Pith Driller enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After boring up through the crust of Mirrodin, it turned its expertise upon the surface dwellers.

card.name: Postmortem Lunge
card.property: ({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.) Return target creature card with converted mana cost X from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Praetor's Grasp
card.property: Search target opponent's library for a card and exile it face down. Then that player shuffles their library. You may look at and play that card for as long as it remains exiled.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sheoldred weaves every thread of information into a noose to hang her enemies.

card.name: Reaper of Sheoldred
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) Whenever a source deals damage to Reaper of Sheoldred, that source's controller gets a poison counter.

card.name: Sheoldred, Whispering One
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) At the beginning of your upkeep, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Surgical Extraction
card.property: ({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.) Choose target card in a graveyard other than a basic land card. Search its owner's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles their library.

card.name: Toxic Nim
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) {B}: Regenerate Toxic Nim.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The nim have become roving killers marshaled by whichever thane holds tenuous leadership.

card.name: Vault Skirge
card.property: ({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.) Flying Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From the remnants of the dead, Geth forged a swarm to safeguard his throne.

card.name: Whispering Specter
card.property: Flying Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) Whenever Whispering Specter deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. If you do, that player discards a card for each poison counter they have.

card.name: Act of Aggression
card.property: ({R/P} can be paid with either {R} or 2 life.) Gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Artillerize
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature. Artillerize deals 5 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Phyrexian or Mirran, most goblins stick to the job they know best.

card.name: Bludgeon Brawl
card.property: Each noncreature, non-Equipment artifact is an Equipment with equip {X} and "Equipped creature gets +X/+0," where X is that artifact's converted mana cost.

card.name: Chancellor of the Forge
card.property: You may reveal this card from your opening hand. If you do, at the beginning of the first upkeep, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with haste. When Chancellor of the Forge enters the battlefield, create X 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens with haste, where X is the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Fallen Ferromancer
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) {1}{R}, {T}: Fallen Ferromancer deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Large or small, all will toil for the Great Work." —Decree of Urabrask

card.name: Furnace Scamp
card.property: Whenever Furnace Scamp deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. If you do, Furnace Scamp deals 3 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Born of the core, and dying to stoke it.

card.name: Geosurge
card.property: Add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact or creature spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The mountains have been corrupted. Otherwise, they would not lend me their fire so easily." —Koth of the Hammer

card.name: Gut Shot
card.property: ({R/P} can be paid with either {R} or 2 life.) Gut Shot deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Down here, we have a more pointed version of the scriptures." —Urabrask's enforcer

card.name: Invader Parasite
card.property: Imprint — When Invader Parasite enters the battlefield, exile target land. Whenever a land with the same name as the exiled card enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, Invader Parasite deals 2 damage to that player.

card.name: Moltensteel Dragon
card.property: ({R/P} can be paid with either {R} or 2 life.) Flying {R/P}: Moltensteel Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Ogre Menial
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) {R}: Ogre Menial gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Priest of Urabrask
card.property: When Priest of Urabrask enters the battlefield, add {R}{R}{R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even in New Phyrexia, red mana sparks glimmers of individualism, passion, and freedom.

card.name: Rage Extractor
card.property: ({R/P} can be paid with either {R} or 2 life.) Whenever you cast a spell with {P} in its mana cost, Rage Extractor deals damage equal to that spell's converted mana cost to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: New Phyrexia is an engine that both consumes and creates malice.

card.name: Razor Swine
card.property: First strike Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They aren't helping the forges. Send them to the surface." —Furnace boss, sector 12

card.name: Ruthless Invasion
card.property: ({R/P} can be paid with either {R} or 2 life.) Nonartifact creatures can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For the survival of our people, every conflict must now end in retreat." —Pythor, Mirran resistance

card.name: Scrapyard Salvo
card.property: Scrapyard Salvo deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of artifact cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Squealstokers! Build me a glorious pile of Mirran metal. Then add yourselves to the pile." —Furnace boss, sector 11

card.name: Slag Fiend
card.property: Slag Fiend's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifact cards in all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Seal the furnace vents. Admit no others. We'll tend our forges without their tainted ways." —Decree of Urabrask

card.name: Slash Panther
card.property: ({R/P} can be paid with either {R} or 2 life.) Haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It runs an endless circuit along the ruined roads of the soon-to-be-forgotten Mirran civilization.

card.name: Tormentor Exarch
card.property: When Tormentor Exarch enters the battlefield, choose one — • Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. • Target creature gets -0/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tend the molten slag, or be the molten slag." —Urabrask's enforcer

card.name: Urabrask the Hidden
card.property: Creatures you control have haste. Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the Mirran resistance arrived, the furnace dwellers looked to Urabrask for guidance. His decree stunned the others: "Let them be."

card.name: Victorious Destruction
card.property: Destroy target artifact or land. Its controller loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The refugees look at these structures with hope. We must relieve them of this burden." —Juex, tormentor exarch

card.name: Volt Charge
card.property: Volt Charge deals 3 damage to any target. Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Vulshok Refugee
card.property: Protection from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will carve my people's vengeance on the face of Phyrexia."

card.name: Whipflare
card.property: Whipflare deals 2 damage to each nonartifact creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The slag-workers wasted no time in creating their own flare pulses to cleanse the area of the incompleat.

card.name: Beast Within
card.property: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kill the weak so they can't drag the strong down to their level. This is true compassion." —Benzir, archdruid of Temple Might

card.name: Birthing Pod
card.property: ({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.) {1}{G/P}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Brutalizer Exarch
card.property: When Brutalizer Exarch enters the battlefield, choose one — • Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. • Put target noncreature permanent on the bottom of its owner's library.

card.name: Chancellor of the Tangle
card.property: You may reveal this card from your opening hand. If you do, at the beginning of your first main phase, add {G}. Vigilance, reach

card.name: Corrosive Gale
card.property: ({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.) Corrosive Gale deals X damage to each creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wipe Sheoldred's spies from the sky. She'll see the result of our vision soon enough." —Glissa

card.name: Death-Hood Cobra
Fresh Meat
card.property: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token for each creature put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A scavenger's favorite appetizer is death.

card.name: Glissa's Scorn
card.property: Destroy target artifact. Its controller loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If it were fit to survive, it wouldn't have been so easily put down." —Glissa

card.name: Glistener Elf
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beg me for life, and I will fill you with the glory of Phyrexian perfection."

card.name: Greenhilt Trainee
card.property: {T}: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if Greenhilt Trainee's power is 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our ancestors adapted to this world of metal. Just as they did, we will adapt to this world of evil."

card.name: Leeching Bite
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A substantial portion of Vorinclex's forces became fuel for the rest.

card.name: Maul Splicer
card.property: When Maul Splicer enters the battlefield, create two 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature tokens. Golem creatures you control have trample.

card.name: Melira, Sylvok Outcast
card.property: You can't get poison counters. Creatures you control can't have -1/-1 counters put on them. Creatures your opponents control lose infect.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once a pariah, now Mirrodin's greatest hope.

card.name: Mutagenic Growth
card.property: ({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.) Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sympathy is for weaklings. Whoever survives, wins." —Benzir, archdruid of Temple Might

card.name: Mycosynth Fiend
card.property: Mycosynth Fiend gets +1/+1 for each poison counter your opponents have.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I wish I could take credit for it, but nature progresses on its own, just the way it should." —Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

card.name: Noxious Revival
card.property: ({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.) Put target card from a graveyard on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Dead or alive, my creations are stronger than Jin-Gitaxias's septic minions." —Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

card.name: Phyrexian Swarmlord
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token with infect for each poison counter your opponents have.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vorinclex had no grand plan. The oil did its own work, evolving creatures into worthy predators.

card.name: Spinebiter
card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) You may have Spinebiter assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

card.name: Thundering Tanadon
card.property: ({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.) Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We do not need beakers and vials to test our predators." —Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

card.name: Triumph of the Hordes
card.property: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample and infect. (Creatures with infect deal damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

card.name: Viridian Betrayers
card.property: Viridian Betrayers has infect as long as an opponent is poisoned. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To secure a place in Phyrexia's ranks, they hunted their surviving kin.

card.name: Viridian Harvest
card.property: Enchant artifact When enchanted artifact is put into a graveyard, you gain 6 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the midst of horror beyond imagining, I still see things that lift my heart." —Ezuri

card.name: Vital Splicer
card.property: When Vital Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token. {1}: Regenerate target Golem you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For every one that falls, ten shall rise. The revelation of New Phyrexia is at hand." —Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

card.name: Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger
card.property: Trample Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced. Whenever an opponent taps a land for mana, that land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Jor Kadeen, the Prevailer
card.property: First strike Metalcraft — Creatures you control get +3/+0 as long as you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As long as my hand holds a blade, there's hope for a pure Mirrodin once again."

card.name: Alloy Myr
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With or without witnesses, the suns continued their prismatic dance.

card.name: Batterskull
card.property: Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 black Germ creature token, then attach this to it.) Equipped creature gets +4/+4 and has vigilance and lifelink. {3}: Return Batterskull to its owner's hand. Equip {5}

card.name: Blinding Souleater
card.property: {W/P}, {T}: Tap target creature. ({W/P} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We thank the souleaters for inscribing our souls with subservience, to reinforce the sacred order." —Drones' hymn of gratitude

card.name: Caged Sun
card.property: As Caged Sun enters the battlefield, choose a color. Creatures you control of the chosen color get +1/+1. Whenever a land's ability causes you to add one or more mana of the chosen color, add one additional mana of that color.

card.name: Conversion Chamber
card.property: {2}, {T}: Exile target artifact card from a graveyard. Put a charge counter on Conversion Chamber. {2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Conversion Chamber: Create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.

card.name: Darksteel Relic
card.property: Indestructible (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this artifact.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's the last thing we can call our own." —Minhu, Mirran resistance

card.name: Etched Monstrosity
card.property: Etched Monstrosity enters the battlefield with five -1/-1 counters on it. {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}, Remove five -1/-1 counters from Etched Monstrosity: Target player draws three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Now etched only with the scars of phyresis.

card.name: Gremlin Mine
card.property: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Gremlin Mine: It deals 4 damage to target artifact creature. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Gremlin Mine: Remove up to four charge counters from target noncreature artifact.

card.name: Hex Parasite
card.property: {X} {B/P}: Remove up to X counters from target permanent. For each counter removed this way, Hex Parasite gets +1/+0 until end of turn. ({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Drawn by power, fueled by conquest.

card.name: Hovermyr
card.property: Flying, vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Originally created to harvest blinkmoths, the hovermyr are now the silent observers of a dying world.

card.name: Immolating Souleater
card.property: {R/P}: Immolating Souleater gets +1/+0 until end of turn. ({R/P} can be paid with either {R} or 2 life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We thank the souleaters for melting the sinful that we may be reminded of our own insignificance." —Drones' hymn of gratitude

card.name: Insatiable Souleater
card.property: {G/P}: Insatiable Souleater gains trample until end of turn. ({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We thank the souleaters for culling our sick so that the strong may earn their triumphs." —Drones' hymn of gratitude

card.name: Isolation Cell
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a creature spell, that player loses 2 life unless they pay {2}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Attrition is the answer. Starve them, and let their despair be their undoing." —Sheoldred, Whispering One

card.name: Kiln Walker
card.property: Whenever Kiln Walker attacks, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If it possesses an ability to understand and appreciate life, it has never shown it.

card.name: Lashwrithe
card.property: Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 black Germ creature token, then attach this to it.) Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each Swamp you control. Equip {B/P}{B/P} ({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)

card.name: Mindcrank
card.property: Whenever an opponent loses life, that player puts that many cards from the top of their library into their graveyard. (Damage dealt by sources without infect causes loss of life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let go of your memories and be reborn." —Argent Etchings, plate 106, passage 27

card.name: Mycosynth Wellspring
card.property: When Mycosynth Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The oil created the mycosynth. The mycosynth created New Phyrexia.

card.name: Myr Superion
card.property: Spend only mana produced by creatures to cast this spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Two kinds of myr survive: the powerful and those that stay close by them.

card.name: Necropouncer
Omen Machine
card.property: Players can't draw cards. At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player exiles the top card of their library. If it's a land card, the player puts it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, the player casts it without paying its mana cost if able.

card.name: Pestilent Souleater
card.property: {B/P}: Pestilent Souleater gains infect until end of turn. ({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life. A creature with infect deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An invasion weapon of ages past, the glistening oil contained the blueprints of countless atrocities.

card.name: Pristine Talisman
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tools and artisans can be destroyed, but the act of creation is inviolate." —Elspeth Tirel

card.name: Shrine of Boundless Growth
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a green spell, put a charge counter on Shrine of Boundless Growth. {T}, Sacrifice Shrine of Boundless Growth: Add {C} for each charge counter on Shrine of Boundless Growth.

card.name: Shrine of Burning Rage
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a red spell, put a charge counter on Shrine of Burning Rage. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Shrine of Burning Rage: It deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to any target.

card.name: Shrine of Limitless Power
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a black spell, put a charge counter on Shrine of Limitless Power. {4}, {T}, Sacrifice Shrine of Limitless Power: Target player discards a card for each charge counter on Shrine of Limitless Power.

card.name: Shrine of Loyal Legions
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a white spell, put a charge counter on Shrine of Loyal Legions. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Shrine of Loyal Legions: Create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token for each charge counter on Shrine of Loyal Legions.

card.name: Shrine of Piercing Vision
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a blue spell, put a charge counter on Shrine of Piercing Vision. {T}, Sacrifice Shrine of Piercing Vision: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of charge counters on Shrine of Piercing Vision. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Sickleslicer
Soul Conduit
card.property: {6}, {T}: Two target players exchange life totals.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You have an unhealthy attachment to your selfhood. I can help you with that." —Malcator, Executor of Synthesis

card.name: Spellskite
card.property: {U/P}: Change a target of target spell or ability to Spellskite. ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let's show Vorinclex that progress doesn't always need teeth or claws." —Malcator, Executor of Synthesis

card.name: Surge Node
card.property: Surge Node enters the battlefield with six charge counters on it. {1}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Surge Node: Put a charge counter on target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without a foe to focus on, the machine priests had time to indulge in new sciences.

card.name: Sword of War and Peace
Torpor Orb
card.property: Creatures entering the battlefield don't cause abilities to trigger.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Phyrexia is certainly dangerous, but I have to admire some of its innovations." —Tezzeret

card.name: Trespassing Souleater
card.property: {U/P}: Trespassing Souleater can't be blocked this turn. ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We thank the souleaters for surveilling our lives that we may be preserved from our own ignorance." —Drones' hymn of gratitude

card.name: Unwinding Clock
card.property: Untap all artifacts you control during each other player's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The partisans have unearthed a strange artifact. None know its origin, but it gives them hope of a life beyond." —Elspeth's journal

card.name: Phyrexia's Core
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So even the heart of our world has succumbed." —Koth of the Hammer
